html:
BOSS MANAGEMENT SERVICES PVT.LTD

MOGAPPAIR, CHENNAI - 600037
FORM XXXVIII(SEE RULE 78 (1)(B)

SALARY SLIP
{{doc.name}}

{% set start_date = frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.start_date) %}
Posting Date: {{doc.posting_date}} Start Date: {{doc.start_date}}
Employee: {{doc.employee}} End Date: {{doc.end_date}}
Employee Name: {{doc.employee_name}} Payroll Frequency: {{doc.payroll_frequency}}
Client Emp No: {{doc.client_employee_no}} Working Days: {{doc.total_working_days}}
Client: {{doc.client_name}} Absent Days: {{doc.absent_days}}
Site: {{doc.site}} Payment Days: {{doc.payment_days}}
A/C No: {{doc.bank_account_no}} IFSC NO: {{doc.ifsc_no}}
UAN NO: {{doc.uan_no}} ESIC NO: {{doc.esi_no}}
Wage Month:{{start_date.strftime("%b")}} {{start_date.strftime("%y")}}
Earnings Deduction
Sr Component Amount
1 Basic {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Basic', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
2 House Rent Allowance {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'House Rent Allowance', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
3 Dearness Allowance {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Dearness Allowance', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
4 Other Allowance {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Other Allowance', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
5 Additional Salary {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Additional salary', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
6 OT Hrs {{frappe.db.get_value('Attendance and OT Register', {'employee':doc.employee}, ['ot_hours']) or 0}}
7 OT Amount {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Over Time', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
8 Service Charge {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Service Charge', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
Sr Component Amount
1 Professional Tax {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Professional Tax', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
2 PF {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Employee PF', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
3 ESI {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Employer ESIC', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
4 Advance {{frappe.db.get_value('Salary Detail', {'salary_component': 'Advance', 'parent': doc.name}, ['amount']) or 0}}
Gross Pay :
{{doc.gross_pay}}
Total Deduction
{{doc.total_deduction}}
Rounded Total
{{doc.rounded_total}}
Total In Words
{{frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.net_pay)}}
Note : This is Computer generated report and does not require signature
name: Boss Salary Slip
